entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 5:19 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: ENE 20 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
